data.text: +2/+6 and Taunt.\nDeathrattle: Summon a Stegodon.

data.name: Pure
data.text: Increased Stats.

data.name: Purified
data.text: Attack changed to 1.

data.name: RAAAAR!
data.text: Stats changed to 10/10.

data.name: Redeemed

data.name: Repentance
data.text: Health reduced to 1.

data.name: Seal of Champions
data.text: +3 Attack and Divine Shield.

data.name: Smuggling
data.text: +1/+1 from Smuggler's Run.

data.text: Attack changed to 1.

data.text: Cost swapped.

data.name: The Mothergloop
data.text: Don't let its growing, gooey friends get\nout of hand.

data.name: Unchained!
data.text: Your next Dragon costs (2) less.

data.name: Val'anyr Reequip Effect Dummy
data.text: It is a dummy card for holding a effect to play when reequipping Val'anyr (LOOT_500)

data.name: Vitus the Exiled
data.text: Corrupted. Banished. Hungry.

data.name: Watched
data.text: Stats changed to 3/3.

data.name: Watched
data.text: Stats changed to 3/3.

data.name: Wise Beyond Years
data.text: Gains +1/+1 at the end of your turn.

data.name: A. F. Kay
data.text: Waylay this adventurer while she isn't\npaying attention!

data.name: Dark Light
data.text: Bend the Light to your will, while you unleash the Apocalypse!

data.name: Follow MY Rules!
data.text: Change the Attack of all other minions to 1.

data.name: Forbidden Healing
data.text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
data.flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

data.name: Paladin
data.text: Select Paladin as your next class.

data.name: Second Class: Paladin
data.text: Add Paladin cards to your deck.

data.name: Tag Team
data.text: Swap George and Karl.

data.name: Adaptation
data.text: Adapt a friendly minion.
data.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

data.name: Autodefense Matrix
data.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
data.flavor: We call it the bubble machine.

data.name: Avenge
data.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
data.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Blessing of Aeons
data.text: Give a minion "At the end of your turn, gain +1/+1."

data.name: Blessing of Might
data.text: Give a minion +3_Attack.
data.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

data.name: Blessing of Wisdom
data.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
data.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

data.name: Competitive Spirit
data.text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
data.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

data.name: Divine Strength
data.text: Give a minion +1/+2.
data.flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

data.name: Eye for an Eye
data.text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal_that much damage to the enemy hero.
data.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

data.name: Getaway Kodo
data.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
data.flavor: Get to da Kodo! Now!

data.name: Glow-Tron
data.text: Magnetic
data.flavor: They tried for weeks to make a stealth version, but eventually decided to just let it glow.

data.name: Grimscale Chum
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nMurloc in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: Listen, see?  We'll take 'em to the docks, see?  And throw 'em in the sea, see?

data.name: Hand of Protection
data.text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
data.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

data.name: Hand of Salvation
data.text: Secret: When your second minion dies in a turn, return it to life.

data.name: Hidden Wisdom
data.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
data.flavor: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

data.name: Humility
data.text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
data.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

data.name: Light's Justice
data.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

data.name: Lost in the Jungle
data.text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
data.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

data.name: Meanstreet Marshal
data.text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.
data.flavor: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

data.name: Noble Sacrifice
data.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
data.flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

data.name: Redemption
data.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
data.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

data.name: Repentance
data.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
data.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

data.name: Righteous Protector
data.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
data.flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

data.name: Sacred Trial
data.text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
data.flavor: You have chosen poorly.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Selfless Hero
data.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
data.flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

data.name: Smuggler's Run
data.text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

data.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
data.text: Quest: Cast 6 spells\non your minions.\nReward: Galvadon.
data.flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

data.name: Vilefin Inquisitor
data.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'
data.flavor: Nobody expects the Vilefin Inquisition!

data.name: A Light in the Darkness
data.text: Discover a minion.\nGive it +1/+1.
data.flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

data.name: Argent Lance
data.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
data.flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

data.name: Argent Protector
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
data.flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

data.name: Cathedral Gargoyle
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
data.flavor: Fly like an eagle, drop like a rock.

data.name: Crystalsmith Kangor
data.text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal\nYour healing is doubled.
data.flavor: He wants to tank, but Boom always makes him play support.

data.name: Crystology
data.text: [x]Draw two 1-Attack\nminions from your deck.
data.flavor: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

data.name: Dark Conviction
data.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
data.flavor: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

data.name: Desperate Stand
data.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
data.flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

data.name: Drygulch Jailor
data.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver_Hand Recruits to_your_hand.
data.flavor: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

data.name: Equality
data.text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
data.flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

data.name: Greater Pearl Spellstone
data.text: Summon a 6/6 Spirit with Taunt.

data.name: Grimestreet Outfitter
data.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

data.name: Guardian Spirit
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Holy Light
data.text: Restore #6 Health.
data.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

data.name: Hydrologist
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
data.flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

data.name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
data.text: (Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

data.name: Potion of Heroism
data.text: Give a minion Divine_Shield.\nDraw a card.
data.flavor: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

data.name: Primalfin Champion
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
data.flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

data.name: Rebuke
data.text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
data.flavor: When one buke just isn’t enough.

data.name: Reinforce
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.

data.name: Reinforce
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.

data.name: Reinforce
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.

data.name: Reinforce
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.

data.name: Seal of Light
data.text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
data.flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

data.name: Shielded Minibot
data.text: Divine Shield
data.flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

data.name: Sound the Bells!
data.text: Echo\nGive a minion +1/+2.
data.flavor: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

data.name: The Silver Hand
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon two 1/1 Recruits.

data.name: The Silver Hand
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon two 1/1 Recruits.

data.name: The Silver Hand
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon two 1/1 Recruits.

data.name: The Silver Hand
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon two 1/1 Recruits.

data.name: The Tidal Hand
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon a 1/1 Silver Hand Murloc.

data.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
data.text: Battlecry: Change an_enemy minion's Attack to 1.
data.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

data.name: Benevolent Djinn
data.text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to your_hero.
data.flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

data.name: Blessed Maul
data.text: Battlecry: Give your minions +1 Attack.

data.name: Champion's Maul
data.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.

data.name: Coghammer
data.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
data.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
data.flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

data.name: Howling Commander
data.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
data.flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

data.name: Muster for Battle
data.text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
data.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

data.name: Nightbane Templar
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
data.flavor: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Paragon of Light
data.text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
data.flavor: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

data.name: Purifier's Maul
data.text: Battlecry: Give your minions Divine Shield.

data.name: Rallying Blade
data.text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
data.flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

data.name: Sacred Maul
data.text: Battlecry: Give your minions Taunt.

data.name: Scarlet Purifier
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
data.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

data.name: Seal of Champions
data.text: Give a minion\n+3 Attack and Divine Shield.
data.flavor: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

data.name: Small-Time Recruits
data.text: [x]Draw three 1-Cost\nminions from your deck.
data.flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

data.name: Steward of Darkshire
data.text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
data.flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

data.name: Sword of Justice
data.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1_Durability.
data.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

data.name: Unidentified Maul
data.text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
data.flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

data.name: Warhorse Trainer
data.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
data.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

data.name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
data.text: Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal
data.flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

data.name: Annoy-o-Module
data.text: Magnetic\nDivine Shield\nTaunt
data.flavor: Every ten seconds it asks if you want to update.

data.name: Arrogant Crusader
data.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
data.flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

data.name: Bellringer Sentry
data.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
data.flavor: "Who are you? Eh, none of my business."

data.name: Blessing of Kings
data.text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
data.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

data.name: Chillblade Champion
data.text: Charge\nLifesteal
data.flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

data.name: Consecration
data.text: Deal $2 damage to all_enemies.
data.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

data.name: Guardian Spirit
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Hammer of Wrath
data.text: Deal $3 damage.\nDraw a card.
data.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

data.name: Keeper of Uldaman
data.text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
data.flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Light's Sorrow
data.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

data.name: Lightfused Stegodon
data.text: Battlecry: Adapt your Silver_Hand Recruits.
data.flavor: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

data.name: Murloc Knight
data.text: Inspire: Summon a random Murloc.
data.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

data.name: Prismatic Lens
data.text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
data.flavor: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

data.name: Silvermoon Portal
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random\n2-Cost minion.
data.flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: The Glass Knight
data.text: [x]Divine Shield\nWhenever you restore Health,\ngain Divine Shield.
data.flavor: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

data.name: Truesilver Champion
data.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #2_Health to it.
data.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

data.name: Blessed Champion
data.text: Double a minion's Attack.
data.flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

data.name: Bolvar Fordragon
data.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

data.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
data.text: Divine Shield\nAfter a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
data.flavor: He's so hot right now.

data.name: Bronze Broodmother
data.text: When you draw this, summon a 1/1 Wee Whelp.

data.name: Call to Arms
data.text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that\n cost (2) or less.
data.flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

data.name: Cobalt Guardian
data.text: Whenever you summon a Mech, gain Divine Shield.
data.flavor: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

data.name: Dragon Consort
data.text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
data.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Galvadon
data.text: Battlecry: Adapt 5 times.

data.name: Ghostly Charger
data.text: Divine Shield\nRush
data.flavor: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

data.name: Grimestreet Enforcer
data.text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

data.name: Holy Wrath
data.text: Draw a card and deal_damage equal to_its Cost.
data.flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

data.name: Level Up!
data.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
data.flavor: Ding!\n\nGrats.

data.name: Mechano-Egg
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
data.flavor: When you need more iron in your diet.

data.name: Prince Liam
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all\n1-Cost cards in your deck\n_into Legendary minions.
data.flavor: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

data.name: Quartermaster
data.text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2.
data.flavor: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

data.name: Shrink Ray
data.text: Set the Attack and Health of all minions\nto 1.
data.flavor: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

data.name: Solemn Vigil
data.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
data.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Stand Against Darkness
data.text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
data.flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

data.name: Tuskarr Jouster
data.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore #7 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

data.name: Avenging Wrath
data.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
data.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

data.name: Blackguard
data.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
data.flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

data.name: Crystal Lion
data.text: [x]Divine Shield\nCosts (1) less for each Silver\nHand Recruit you control.
data.flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

data.name: Enter the Coliseum
data.text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
data.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

data.name: Glowstone Technician
data.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
data.flavor: "Windell! More light!"\n\n"I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

data.name: Guardian Spirit
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Ivory Knight
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell.\nRestore Health to your hero\nequal to its Cost.
data.flavor: Do NOT call it a "horse".
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Mysterious Challenger
data.text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
data.flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

data.name: Spikeridged Steed
data.text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
data.flavor: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

data.name: Sunkeeper Tarim
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
data.flavor: Ironically, his favorite number is 4.

data.name: Val'anyr
data.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
data.flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

data.name: Eadric the Pure
data.text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions'\nAttack to 1.
data.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

data.name: Grimestreet Protector
data.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Give adjacent\n_minions Divine Shield.
data.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

data.name: Guardian of Kings
data.text: Battlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

data.name: Kangor's Endless Army
data.text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
data.flavor: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless."\n- Countess Ashmore

data.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell\nyou cast on your minions\n this game on this one.
data.flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

data.name: Vinecleaver
data.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon two 1/1 Silver\nHand Recruits.
data.flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

data.name: Dinosize
data.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
data.flavor: Comes with fries and a drink.

data.name: Grave Vengeance
data.text: Lifesteal

data.name: Lay on Hands
data.text: Restore #8 Health. Draw_3 cards.
data.flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

data.name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
data.text: At the end of your turn, restore #8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
data.flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

data.name: Silver Sword
data.text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
data.flavor: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

data.name: Tirion Fordring
data.text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3_Ashbringer.
data.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

data.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
data.text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
data.flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

data.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
data.text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.

data.name: Anyfin Can Happen
data.text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
data.flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
